ðŸ“– Summary: br-cli is a command-line tool designed to facilitate browser automation for AI agents. It allows AI agents like Claude Code and Gemini CLI to control web browsers, manage sessions, and perform tasks such as login and data extraction. The tool features LLM-friendly output, daemon mode for persistent sessions, structured web page views, secret management, and history tracking for replay and scripting.
